name: unshelled
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
Unshelled nuts and other foods have not had their hard outer covering removed: Unshelled nuts keep longer than shelled nuts. Parboil the unshelled beans until they are bright green. Related word
shell verb (COVERING)
More examplesFewer examplesPlace the unshelled pistachios on a baking tray and sprinkle with salt.She says that many types of unshelled nuts can be kept for several months in a cool place, but shelled nuts are likely to go rancid.Planting unshelled seeds resulted in fewer seedlings.The mains include unshelled prawns (locally smoked) and flash-fried squid. You can buy peanuts shelled or unshelled, salted or unsalted, raw or roasted.
